2. **Identify the number of people you want to invite**: Think about how many family members, friends, or other guests your colleague's daughter would like to attend the ceremony.
3. **Match the number of tickets to the number of guests**: Assign one ticket to each guest you want to invite. Make sure you don't exceed the total number of tickets you have.
